DOC.brief_summary: To show whether addition thrombolytic treatment single bolus injection tenecteplase prior early standard PCI ( percutaneous coronary intervention ) improve clinical outcome patient large acute myocardial infarct compare primary PCI alone .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Evaluating Efficacy Safety Tenecteplase Together With Unfractionated Heparin Prior Early Percutaneous Coronary Intervention ( PCI ) Compared Standard Primary PCI Patients With Acute Myocardial Infarction ( ASSENT 4 PCI )
DOC.criteria: Patients give informed consent Patients large acute myocardial infarction randomise within 6 hour symptom onset Patients schedule undergo primary PCI Patients reach cath lab 60 min later 3 hour randomisation ( Otherwise patient fulfill usual selection criterion thrombolytic treatment PCI ) None
